page.title: 10Pencombe Fete / 2.
page.content: The stalls are ready for when the people arrive.These being mainly erected around the school field and include a variety of activities.These are:A tombola,lucky dip,lucky straw, bottle,white elephant,ice cream, clothes,plant and cake stalls.There is also a raffle draw. Refreshments are to be sought in the village hall;where tea,coffee, soft drinks,home made cakes and sandwiches are enjoyed. A local dog show,skittles competition and welly wanging are also going on around the field. During the mid-afternoon the children's novelty races begin.This year there are a toddlers,sack and obstacle races for the different aged children.Winners each receive a small amount of money as a prize.
